title: Get your email PW within Thunderbird
content: Is there a way to get your email password within Thunderbird? I'm trying to add TB to a new computer but it is not taking the password that I thought I was using.

title: Cannot send email on Thunderbird, but only receive.
content: Long time user, but suddenly I cannot send email on Thunderbird. I receive message: "ELNK003. Error code 308. Verify email address in Account Settings". All appears OK to me, but I cannot send , but only receive. Thanks, Michael Opitz [edited] @mindspring.com Cell: [edited phone# from community support forum]

title: Transferring Address book  from my PC to a laptop
content: Good Morning, I donate to Thunderbird on a regular basis. I have had bought for me a new Lenovo Laptop. I have managed to install Thundebird OK but my address book has not moved over to my Laptop. Why has this not happened & could be so kind as to instruct me on how to resolve it. Iam 86 & registered as disabled & my Computer skills are a little limited. I have tried to import the addres book but have not succeeded. Regards Peter Alexander Carr 0744 393 5419
creator: assheton63

title: thunderbird problem
content: I installed mozilla thunderbird on the new computer and copied the settings and messages from the old computer. I got two folders that can't be deleted and can't be used and they're dirty and won't let me move anything into them. When I close and reopen the program, those two folders become 4 folders, multiplied and one can always be deleted and appear again.

title: Mails forsvinder
content: Hej. Hvad skal jeg gøre så vores mail ikke forsvinder. Jeg kan kun finde mails fra 2024. Alle de mails jeg har gemt i mapper, som f.eks garantibevis og andre mails der skal gemmes, er væk. Håber I kan hjælpe. Vh. birte
creator: jobis1

title: Thunderbird stopped downloading messages, I'm using Yahoo and Cox
content: Hello Team, About a month ago Thunderbird stopped downloading new messages, on my desktop pc. I have a Cox email account, and about a year ago they switched to using Yahoo. It's been working fine until last month. When I open TB, the inbox count of unread messages keeps climbing, but it's not adding new emails. I think it's actually adding duplicates of already downloaded emails. Some of which it looks like it is adding several copies, like 3 or 4. Can you tell me where to start? Many thanks.
creator: ljcaputo

title: My Thunderbird profile shows 32GB stored emails while on application it is not more than 10GB
content: Hi, I want to copy my Thunderbird profile in windows 10 from old computer to a new one, whan I go in Roamng>Thinderbird>Profiles> it shows total size 32 GB. I tried deleting in the Thunderbird application some emails but total size in prifeles reduced only by 1 Gb, I gues that some very old emails even before 2012 are stored somwhare in Profles but I can not locate. Whan I go to Inbox.sbd it shows 8,5 GB but whan I enter in the applicatin shows much less size?
creator: goranarnaudovski

title: Android move controls to bottom (or allow to customize)
content:
I just switched from Blue Mail to Thunderbird on Android.

First s big thanks for finally making Thunderbird on desktop touch friendly, this was long overdue.

Now to my feature request for thunderbird Android. Please allow (or just enable my default) that the controls to search in mails/delete mails etc are moved to the bottom of the screen so you can easily reach them on as mobile phone (just like blue Mail does it).

Second smaller request: please make the email list less "crowded" somehow the fonts and density are hard to read. Again have a look at blue Mail for how to do this a bit better. Could also be an option.
creator: aherz81

title: Gmail login pop up window not having any access to passkey
content: A window pops up asking me to sign in to google. But that window does not have the toolbar, so I can't access my password manager (Bitwarden). And when I click continue in that windows, google does not get my passkey.

title: problems populating some gmail files on iPhone 14
content:
iPhone 14 Pro with current iOS 18.2 using Mail for emails. Have lost all of the emails in an entire file, with many subfolders and emails. used to be there, now not... Other files and folders populated.

have removed and reinstalled Gmail account twice and still cannot get the problem file or subfolders to work. other files and folders do populate but I need to access each of them individually to initially view the emails in them 

Gmail accessed via Thunderbird 128.5.2esr (32-biot) on my desktop pc (win 10) AND  Mail on another iPhone (10).  They both still have all of the files and folders on them, INCLUDING the problem one.

I sent a trial email to the account, it shows in inbox on the problem phone. Tried to transfer it to one of the folders in the problem file and it does not transfer. On my pc and the other iPhone, it does.

attached 2 pics: first of files and folders, second same but with expanded file view Help?! Thanks.
creator: dv.otterholt

title: Two Questions
content: I had to reinstall Thunderbird. Once I got into it, I noticed the layout had changed. Before all the message would be on top and if I clicked on a message, the message would show up on the bottom of the page. Now the message shows up on the right hand side. How do I change it to back it was? I did make a backup of my Thunderbird before I reinstalled it (months ago), how can I transfer my address book from that copy to the new copy? Thanks Dan
creator: timlab55
